column3: LigthVirtualFile contains incorrect file type when created from text but has originalFile

Have you submitted a contributor license agreement? If not, please download the PDF from http://www.jetbrains.org/display/IJOS/Contributor+Agreement and then print it out, sign (mention you github account name there), scan and email to contribute@jetbrains.com
We didn't receive it yet. Could you please re-send?

@hurricup, this fix looks ok for me, but probably it would be better to override getFileType in LightVirtualFile to delegate to original file if it's present.
@nicity, what do you think?
That was my first intention, but, my mentor been afraid that such solution may affect platforms or other plugins code. So used the most safe way to my knowlege.
Added delegation of getFileType to the original file
